courseSectionInformation: 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MCB 252 or consent of instructor.
description: General principles of molecular signaling regulating membrane, cytoplasmic, and nuclear events in eukaryotic cells with emphasis on mammalian systems. Contemporary methods of investigation and the principles of identifying and solving problems related to signal transduction will be emphasized. 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Prerequisite: MCB 252 or consent of instructor.
label: Eukaryotic Cell Signaling
